attributes.action: Make theory test/dvla registration/insurance requirement for all road users
attributes.additional_details:
Mandatory theory test regardless of type of vehicle.

Legal requirement to register with dvla for all modes of travel on the roads.

Legal requirement to have to insurance for all modes of travel on the roads.
attributes.background: Bring in legislation to require all road users including cyclists and e-cyclists to have a valid theory test certificate, insurance and be registered with the dvla for identification purposes.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action: 

Introduce licences, number plates and insurance requirements for cyclists
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701762

Require registration, mot, road tax and insurance for all e-bikes
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/712439

Require e-bike riders to be licensed & regulated like mopeds
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701672
